name: Critter Capers
description:
Critter Capers is a puzzle adventure where you play as two cute critters who have escaped captivity from a medical research facility. This game can be played solo or co-op.

Controls:

  • Use WASD to control the chipmunk.
  • Use ARROW KEYS to control the bunny.   

Contributors:

  • Game and music created by: MrMasticater
  • All other assets created by: Ashley K (*except those listed below)

*Some assets used from HeartBeast (Bush, Tree, Cliff Tile, Dirt Tile, Bat Sprite, Fox Sprite, Sound Effects).
